healthcareai
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • fake vignette

Recalculate predicted value based on alternate scenarios

After getting alternate features via calculateSDChanges recalculate predicted values for each row in df.

calulcateAlternatePredictions(df, modelObj, type, outVectorAppend = NULL,
  removeCols = NULL)

Arguments

df

Data frame from which we'll calculate alternate predictions
modelObj

Object representing the model that is used for predictions
type

String representing which type of model is used
outVectorAppend

Optional list of values that we'll append predictions to. If not used, then a new vector is created.
removeCols

Optional list of column names to remove before calculating alternate predictions.

References

http://healthcareai-r.readthedocs.io

See also

healthcareai

Examples

library(caret)
#> Loading required package: lattice
#> Loading required package: ggplot2
df <- data.frame(a=c(1,2,3,1),
                 b=c('m','f','m','m'),
                 c=c(0.7,1.4,2.4,2.0),
                 d=c(100,250,200,150))

# Get alternate feature scenarios
dfResult <- calculateSDChanges(df=df,
                               rowNum=2,
                               sizeOfSDPerturb = 0.5,
                               numColLeaveOut='d')

y <- c('y','n','y','n')

# Train model on original data frame
glmOb <- train(x = df,y = y,method = 'glm',family = 'binomial')
#> Warning: model fit failed for Resample01: parameter=none Error in `contrasts<-`(`*tmp*`, value = contr.funs[1 + isOF[nn]]) : 
#>   contrasts can be applied only to factors with 2 or more levels
#> Warning: model fit failed for Resample02: parameter=none Error in `contrasts<-`(`*tmp*`, value = contr.funs[1 + isOF[nn]]) : 
#>   contrasts can be applied only to factors with 2 or more levels
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading

#>   contrasts can be applied only to factors with 2 or more levels
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: model fit failed for Resample08: parameter=none Error in `contrasts<-`(`*tmp*`, value = contr.funs[1 + isOF[nn]]) : 
#>   contrasts can be applied only to factors with 2 or more levels
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: model fit failed for Resample11: parameter=none Error in `contrasts<-`(`*tmp*`, value = contr.funs[1 + isOF[nn]]) : 
#>   contrasts can be applied only to factors with 2 or more levels
#> Warning: model fit failed for Resample12: parameter=none Error in `contrasts<-`(`*tmp*`, value = contr.funs[1 + isOF[nn]]) :

#>   contrasts can be applied only to factors with 2 or more levels
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: model fit failed for Resample18: parameter=none Error in `contrasts<-`(`*tmp*`, value = contr.funs[1 + isOF[nn]]) : 
#>   contrasts can be applied only to factors with 2 or more levels
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: model fit failed for Resample22: parameter=none Error in `contrasts<-`(`*tmp*`, value = contr.funs[1 + isOF[nn]]) : 
#>   contrasts can be applied only to factors with 2 or more levels
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: model fit failed for Resample25: parameter=none Error in `contrasts<-`(`*tmp*`, value = contr.funs[1 + isOF[nn]]) : 
#>   contrasts can be applied only to factors with 2 or more levels
#> Warning: There were missing values in resampled performance measures.

outList <- calulcateAlternatePredictions(df=dfResult,
                                         modelObj=glmOb,
                                         type='lasso')
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
#> Warning: prediction from a rank-deficient fit may be misleading
outList
#> $y
#> [1] 0.0001486937
